alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Crazy Mountains; Livingston Area; Northern Park; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley; Red Lodge Foothills (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 18 at 9:44PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...LIGHT TO MODERATE SNOW SHOWERS WILL MOVE THROUGH THE AREA THIS EVENING... Light to moderate snow showers will move through the area this evening. These snow showers will quickly lower visibility below one mile at times. The heavier snow showers could drop an inch or two of snow as they move through. Road surfaces could become snow covered and slick. Conditions will quickly change as snow showers move through, so travelers are urged to use caution. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Red Lodge, Big Timber, Clyde Park, Cooke City, Absarokee, Bearcreek, Springdale, Reed Point, Mystic Lake, Belfry, Fishtail, Alpine, Roberts, Dean, Mc Leod, Fox, Pine Creek, Cooney Reservoir State Park and Greycliff. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
